title: Sins of Colonialism - Collection 16 (.. in the Americas 5)
description:
Sins of Colonialism - Collection 16 (.. in the Americas 5):

Welcome back TPB... We salute your  resilience and perseverance...
We continue our uploads with 35 titles:

-  Banner - How the Indians Lost Their Land; Law and Power on the Frontier (2005)

-  Beatty-Medina & Rinehart (Eds.) - Contested Territories; Native Americans and Non-Natives in the Lower Great Lakes, 1700-1850 (2012)

-  Biggs - Conquer and Colonize; Stevenson's Regiment and California (1977)

-  Bowes - The Trail of Tears; Removal in the South (2007)

-  Burin - Slavery and the Peculiar Solution; a History of the American Colonization Society (2005)

-  Calloway - Pen & Ink Witchcraft; Treaties and Treaty Making in American Indian History (2013)

-  Case & Voluck - Alaska Natives and American Laws, 3e (2012)

-  Corrigan - Europeans and Native Americans (2014)

-  De Molina - Account of the Fables and Rites of the Incas (2011)

-  Dickey - The People of the River's Mouth; In Search of the Missouria Indians (2011)

-  Elliott - Empires of the Atlantic World; Britain and Spain in America, 1492-1830 (2006)

-  Flexico (Ed.) - Treaties with American Indians; an Encyclopedia of Rights, Conflicts, and Sovereignty (2008)

-  Folsom - The Yaquis and the Empire; Violence, Spanish Imperial Power, and Native Resilience in Colonial Mexico (2014)

-  Groneman - Battlefield of Texas (1998)

-  Gunther - Ambiguous Justice; Native American and the Law in Southern California, 1848-1890 (2006)

-  Lawson - Little Bighorn; Winning the Battle, Losing the War (2007)

-  Lindsay - Murder State; California's Native American Genocide, 1846-1873 (2012)

-  Lipman - The Saltwater Frontier; Indians and the Contest for the American Coast (2015)

-  Luebering (Ed.) - Native American History (2011)

-  McCarty - A Place to Be Navajo; Rough Rock and the Struggle for Self-Determination in Indigenous Schooling (2002)

-  McMurtry - Oh What a Slaughter; Massacres in the American West, 1846-1890 (2005)

-  Miller - Hollow Victory; the White River Expedition of 1879 and the Battle of Milk Creek (1997)

-  Pohl - The Conquistador, 1492-1550 (2001)

-  Rodriguez-Silva - Silencing Race; Disentangling Blackness, Colonialism, and National Identities in Puerto Rico (2012)

-  Silva - Aloha Betrayed; Native Hawaiian Resistance to American Colonialism (2004)

-  Smithers - The Cherokee Diaspora; an Indigenous History of Migration, Resettlement, and Identity (2015)

-  The American Indians; War for the Plains (1994)

-  Trafzer - Exterminate Them; Written Accounts of the Murder, Rape, and Slavery of Native Americans During the California Gold Rush, 1848-68 (1999)

-  Trafzer et al (Eds.) - Boarding School Blues; Revisiting American Indian Educational Experiences (2006)

-  Treuer - Rez Life; an Indian's Journey Through Reservation Life (2012)

-  Trujillo-Pagan - Modern Colonization by Medical Intervention; U.S. Medicine in Puerto Rico (2013)

-  Wilkins - American Indian Politics and the American Political System, 2e (2007)

-  Wilkins - The Masking of Justice; American Indian Sovereignty and the U.S. Supreme Court (1997)
